testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to update holiday information for the specified id number via API connection.
testcase.name: The updated_Id information in the response body returned from the /api/holidayUpdate/{id} endpoint should be
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/holidayUpdate/43" path parameters..................passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing the updated holiday data to send to the api holidayUpdate endpoint..passed * The api user sends the PATCH request and saves the response returned from the api holidayUpdate endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the updated id information in the response body matches the id path parameter specified in the endpoint..passed
